title: Compassion Over Hatred
itunes:title: Compassion Over Hatred
description:
Episode 147 -  It is easy to hate, but you know what is hard? To learn to have compassion when you want to hate. In this episode I dive deep into this topic and talk about how learning to have compassion will make you a happier, more patient person.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
